## CalibrationOptions.colorTolerance property

Allowed difference between the color in the screenshot and [calibrationColor](./assistive-playwright-client.calibrationoptions.calibrationcolor.md)<!-- -->, 0 meaning no difference. The difference is computed as the sum of the absolute value of the difference for each red, green and blue parts. Defaults to `[255, 0, 0]`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
colorTolerance?: number;
```
